title: It Will Rain
composer: Philip Lawrence / Bruno Mars / Ari Levine

lyrics.text_pt: - Irá Chover -
lyrics.text_en: - It Will Rain -
lyrics.text_pron: - It wíl rêin -

lyrics.text_pt: Se um dia você me deixar, amor
lyrics.text_en: If you ever leave me, baby
lyrics.text_pron: If iú éver lív mí, bêibi

lyrics.text_pt: Deixe um pouco de morfina na minha porta
lyrics.text_en: Leave some morphine at my door
lyrics.text_pron: Lív sâm mórfin át mai dór

lyrics.text_pt: Porque precisaria de muitos medicamentos
lyrics.text_en: 'Cause it would take a whole lot of medication
lyrics.text_pron: Câs it wúd têik á hôul lót of médikêishon

lyrics.text_pt: Para perceber que o que nós costumávamos ter
lyrics.text_en: To realize what we used to have
lyrics.text_pron: Tu ríalaiz wât wi iúzd tu hâv

lyrics.text_pt: Nós não temos mais
lyrics.text_en: We don't have it anymore
lyrics.text_pron: Wi dôunt hâv it enimór

lyrics.text_pt: Não há religião que possa me salvar
lyrics.text_en: There's no religion that could save me
lyrics.text_pron: Dérs nôu rilíjon dât cúd sêiv mí

lyrics.text_pt: Não importa quanto tempo meus joelhos estejam no chão, oh
lyrics.text_en: No matter how long my knees are on the floor, oh
lyrics.text_pron: Nôu mâter háu lóng mai nís ár on dé flór, ôu

lyrics.text_pt: Então se lembre de todos os sacrifícios que estou fazendo
lyrics.text_en: So keep in mind all the sacrifices I'm making
lyrics.text_pron: Sôu kíp in máind ôl dé sâkrifáisis áim mêikin

lyrics.text_pt: Para te manter ao meu lado
lyrics.text_en: To keep you by my side
lyrics.text_pron: Tu kíp iú bái mai sáid

lyrics.text_pt: Para evitar que você saia pela porta
lyrics.text_en: To keep you from walking out the door
lyrics.text_pron: Tu kíp iú from wókin áut dé dór

lyrics.text_pt: Porque não haverá luz do Sol
lyrics.text_en: 'Cause there'll be no sunlight
lyrics.text_pron: Câs dérl bi nôu sânláit

lyrics.text_pt: Se eu te perder, amor
lyrics.text_en: If I lose you, baby
lyrics.text_pron: If ái lúz iú, bêibi

lyrics.text_pt: Não haverá céu limpo
lyrics.text_en: There'll be no clear skies
lyrics.text_pron: Dérl bi nôu clír skáis

lyrics.text_pt: Se eu te perder, amor
lyrics.text_en: If I lose you, baby
lyrics.text_pron: If ái lúz iú, bêibi

lyrics.text_pt: Assim como as nuvens, meus olhos farão o mesmo
lyrics.text_en: Just like the clouds, my eyes will do the same
lyrics.text_pron: Jâst láik dé cláudz, mai áis wíl dú dé sêim

lyrics.text_pt: Se você for embora, todo dia irá chover, chover, chover
lyrics.text_en: If you walk away, everyday it'll rain, rain, rain
lyrics.text_pron: If iú wók awêi, évridêi itl rêin, rêin, rêin

lyrics.text_pt: Eu nunca serei o favorito da sua mãe
lyrics.text_en: I'll never be your mother's favorite
lyrics.text_pron: Áil nêver bi iúr mâders fêivorit

lyrics.text_pt: Seu pai não consegue nem sequer me olhar nos olhos, oh
lyrics.text_en: Your daddy can't even look me in the eye, oh
lyrics.text_pron: Iúr dâdi cân't íven lúk mí in dé ái, ôu

lyrics.text_pt: Se eu estivesse no lugar deles, estaria fazendo a mesma coisa
lyrics.text_en: If I was in their shoes, I'd be doing the same thing
lyrics.text_pron: If ái wáz in dér shúz, áid bi dúin dé sêim fing

lyrics.text_pt: Dizendo: Lá vai a minha garotinha
lyrics.text_en: Saying: There goes my little girl
lyrics.text_pron: Sêin: Dér gôuz mai lítul gãrl

lyrics.text_pt: Andando com aquele cara problemático
lyrics.text_en: Walking with that troublesome guy
lyrics.text_pron: Wókin wid dât trâblsâm gái

lyrics.text_pt: Mas eles estão apenas com medo de algo que eles não entendem, oh
lyrics.text_en: But they're just afraid of something they can't understand, oh
lyrics.text_pron: Bât dér jâst afrêid of sâmfin déi cân't anderstând, ôu

lyrics.text_pt: Mas, querida, me observe fazê-los mudar de ideia
lyrics.text_en: But, little darling, watch me change their minds
lyrics.text_pron: Bât, lítul dárlin, wótch mí tchêindj dér máinds

lyrics.text_pt: Sim, por você, eu vou tentar, vou tentar, vou tentar, vou tentar
lyrics.text_en: Yeah, for you, I'll try, I'll try, I'll try, I'll try
lyrics.text_pron: Iê, for iú, áil trái, áil trái, áil trái, áil trái

lyrics.text_pt: E vou recolher esses cacos até que eu esteja sangrando
lyrics.text_en: And pick up these broken pieces 'til I'm bleeding
lyrics.text_pron: And pík âp dís brôuken písis til áim blídin

lyrics.text_pt: Se isso fizer você ser minha
lyrics.text_en: If that'll make you mine
lyrics.text_pron: If dâtl mêik iú máin

lyrics.text_pt: Porque não haverá luz do Sol
lyrics.text_en: 'Cause there'll be no sunlight
lyrics.text_pron: Câs dérl bi nôu sânláit

lyrics.text_pt: Se eu te perder, amor
lyrics.text_en: If I lose you, baby
lyrics.text_pron: If ái lúz iú, bêibi

lyrics.text_pt: Não haverá céu limpo
lyrics.text_en: There'll be no clear skies
lyrics.text_pron: Dérl bi nôu clír skáis

lyrics.text_pt: Se eu te perder, amor
lyrics.text_en: If I lose you, baby
lyrics.text_pron: If ái lúz iú, bêibi

lyrics.text_pt: Assim como as nuvens, meus olhos farão o mesmo
lyrics.text_en: Just like the clouds, my eyes will do the same
lyrics.text_pron: Jâst láik dé cláudz, mai áis wíl dú dé sêim

lyrics.text_pt: Se você for embora, todo dia irá chover, chover, chover
lyrics.text_en: If you walk away, everyday it'll rain, rain, rain
lyrics.text_pron: If iú wók awêi, évridêi itl rêin, rêin, rêin

lyrics.text_pt: Oh, não diga (não diga)
lyrics.text_en: Oh, don't you say (don't you say)
lyrics.text_pron: Ôu, dôunt iú sêi (dôunt iú sêi)

lyrics.text_pt: Adeus (adeus)
lyrics.text_en: Goodbye (goodbye)
lyrics.text_pron: Gúdbái (gúdbái)

lyrics.text_pt: Não diga (não diga)
lyrics.text_en: Don't you say (don't you say)
lyrics.text_pron: Dôunt iú sêi (dôunt iú sêi)

lyrics.text_pt: Adeus (adeus)
lyrics.text_en: Goodbye (goodbye)
lyrics.text_pron: Gúdbái (gúdbái)

lyrics.text_pt: Vou recolher esses cacos até que eu esteja sangrando
lyrics.text_en: I'll pick up these broken pieces 'til I'm bleeding
lyrics.text_pron: Áil pík âp dís brôuken písis til áim blídin

lyrics.text_pt: Se isso fizer tudo ficar bem
lyrics.text_en: If that'll make it right
lyrics.text_pron: If dâtl mêik it ráit

lyrics.text_pt: Porque não haverá luz do Sol
lyrics.text_en: 'Cause there'll be no sunlight
lyrics.text_pron: Câs dérl bi nôu sânláit

lyrics.text_pt: Se eu te perder, amor
lyrics.text_en: If I lose you, baby
lyrics.text_pron: If ái lúz iú, bêibi

lyrics.text_pt: E não haverá céu limpo
lyrics.text_en: And there'll be no clear skies
lyrics.text_pron: And dérl bi nôu clír skáis

lyrics.text_pt: Se eu te perder, amor
lyrics.text_en: If I lose you, baby
lyrics.text_pron: If ái lúz iú, bêibi

lyrics.text_pt: E assim como as nuvens, meus olhos farão o mesmo
lyrics.text_en: And just like the clouds, my eyes will do the same
lyrics.text_pron: And jâst láik dé cláudz, mai áis wíl dú dé sêim

lyrics.text_pt: Se você for embora, todo dia irá chover, chover, chover
lyrics.text_en: If you walk away, everyday it'll rain, rain, rain
lyrics.text_pron: If iú wók awêi, évridêi itl rêin, rêin, rêin

lyrics.text_pt: FIM
lyrics.text_en: END
lyrics.text_pron: END

lyrics.text_pt: Composição: Philip Lawrence / Bruno Mars / Ari Levine
lyrics.text_en: Composition: Philip Lawrence / Bruno Mars / Ari Levine
lyrics.text_pron: Cômpozíshon: Philip Lawrence / Bruno Mars / Ari Levine
